description: Based on an archival Ralph Lauren jacket, this piece is crafted from sustainably produced suede and specially treated to achieve a vintage appearance.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 26.25" front body length, a 25.75" back body length, a 19.75" shoulder, a 43.5" chest, and a 35.5" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes 1" between sizes.
Long sleeves with buttoned barrel cuffs. Corozo buttons. Ventilating metal grommets at the underarms. Corozo buttons.
Left chest zip pocket. Two front waist angled pockets. Interior right chest pocket.
Adjustable buckled tabs at the back waist. Fully lined.
By purchasing this product, you are supporting sustainable leather manufacturing through the Leather Working Group.
Dry clean by a leather specialist. Imported.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size medium.
